description: Explore how blockchain technology is revolutionizing healthcare by enhancing security, data interoperability, and operational efficiency. Discover its applications in patient-centric records, pharmaceutical authentication, and more, while addressing challenges such as scalability and regulatory compliance.
keywords: blockchain technology, healthcare, data security, patient records, interoperability, supply chain management, clinical trials, smart contracts, healthcare innovation
title: Revolutionizing Healthcare: The Role of Blockchain Technology
